sentences.sContent: Her willingness to be subservient to her children isolated her.
sentences.sCn: 她对她的孩子们顺从的意愿使她陷于孤立。

synos.tran: 屈从的；奉承的；有用的；有帮助的

trans.tranCn: 屈从的, 有帮助的, 有用的, 奉承的
trans.tranOther: always obeying another person and doing everything they want you to do – used when someone seems too weak and powerless
